rowlet.name: rowlet
rowlet.description:
Flies noiselessly on delicate wings. It has mastered the art of
deftly launching dagger-sharp feathers from those same wings.
rowlet.title: Pok√©mon Pluma Hoja

dartrix.name: dartrix
dartrix.description:
Regularly basks in sunlight to gather power‚Äîpresumably due to
the frigid climate. Nonetheless, the edges of the blade quills set
into its wings are keen as ever.
dartrix.title: Pok√©mon Pluma Filo

decidueye.name: decidueye
decidueye.description:
The air stored inside the rachises of Decidueye's feathers
insulates the Pok√©mon against Hisui's extreme cold. This is
firm proof that evolution can be influenced by environment.
decidueye.title: Pok√©mon Pluma Flecha

cyndaquil.name: cyndaquil
cyndaquil.description:
Hails from the Johto region. Though usually curled into a ball
due to its timid disposition, it harbors tremendous firepower.
cyndaquil.title: Pok√©mon Rat√≥n Fuego

quilava.name: quilava
quilava.description:
This creature's fur is most mysterious‚Äîit is wholly impervious to
the burning touch of flame. Should Quilava turn its back to you,
take heed! Such a posture indicates a forthcoming attack.
quilava.title: Pok√©mon Volc√°n

typhlosion.name: typhlosion
typhlosion.description:
Said to purify lost, forsaken souls with its flames and guide them
to the afterlife. I believe its form has been influenced by the
energy of the sacred mountain towering at Hisui's center.
typhlosion.title: Pok√©mon Volc√°n

oshawott.name: oshawott
oshawott.description:
This Pok√©mon from the Unova region uses the shell on its belly
as a weapon to cut down its foes. Thus, I've conferred upon this
shell the name ‚Äùscalchop‚Äù.
oshawott.title: Pok√©mon Nutria

dewott.name: dewott
dewott.description:
Its exquisite double-scalchop technique is likely the result of
daily training, and it can send even masters of the blade fleeing
in defeat.
dewott.title: Pok√©mon Superaci√≥n

samurott.name: samurott
samurott.description:
Hard of heart and deft of blade, this rare form of Samurott is
a product of the Pok√©mon's evolution in the region of Hisui. Its
turbulent blows crash into foes like ceaseless pounding waves.
samurott.title: Pok√©mon Majestuoso

bidoof.name: bidoof
bidoof.description:
Bidoof has an unsophisticated face and is rarely flustered by
anything. There have been incidents involving Bidoof sauntering
into villages and gnawing on the houses without a single care.
bidoof.title: Pok√©mon Gran Rat√≥n

bibarel.name: bibarel
bibarel.description:
Bibarel fur repels water and is also a fantastic material for heat
retention. These Pok√©mon create dams on rivers to live in.
bibarel.title: Pok√©mon Castor

starly.name: starly
starly.description:
They live in the fields and mountains, gathering in large flocks.
Their cries are quite obnoxious. Though small, their wings are
strong‚Äîa strike from them leaves pain that persists for a week.
starly.title: Pok√©mon Estornino

staravia.name: staravia
staravia.description:
They form remarkably large flocks and are constantly fighting
amongst themselves. I suspect that those with magnificent
plumes on their heads are the strong ones.
staravia.title: Pok√©mon Estornino

staraptor.name: staraptor
staraptor.description:
It has left the flock, having gained strength enough to survive on
its own. The astounding force with which Staraptor flies through
the air allows it to carry away large, burly targets.
staraptor.title: Pok√©mon Depredador

shinx.name: shinx
shinx.description:
Shakes its body to generate electricity. Its stature belies its
aggression‚Äîone must be patient to tame this Pok√©mon.
shinx.title: Pok√©mon Flash

luxio.name: luxio
luxio.description:
Proudly uses its electrified claws as weapons. It seems to be a
gracious Pok√©mon, evenly sharing the spoils of the hunt with
others of its kind.
luxio.title: Pok√©mon Chispa

luxray.name: luxray
luxray.description:
They form packs, each having one male as leader. Legends say
that when Luxray's two eyes shimmer with gold, the Pok√©mon
can see through anything.
luxray.title: Pok√©mon Chispa Ojos

wurmple.name: wurmple
wurmple.description:
Likes sap and is abundant in the wild. Why it evolves into
various different forms is unknown. One cannot tell from a
Wurmple's appearance which form it will take when it evolves.
wurmple.title: Pok√©mon Gusano

silcoon.name: silcoon
silcoon.description:
Wraps itself in thin strings of silk while it stores energy for
evolution. It can't extend its limbs and its movement is slow,
but its eyes keep a sharp lookout‚ÄîSilcoon is always on guard.
silcoon.title: Pok√©mon Capullo

beautifly.name: beautifly
beautifly.description:
A colorful and incredibly beautiful but also greedy Pok√©mon.
In an effort to keep its favorite food all to itself, it will chase
away Combee as they try to gather nectar.
beautifly.title: Pok√©mon Mariposa

cascoon.name: cascoon
cascoon.description:
The silk coating its body is thin but sufficiently strong. Cascoon's
silk has a luster and texture superior to that of Silcoon's, and
clothes made using Cascoon silk are regarded as top-notch.
cascoon.title: Pok√©mon Capullo

dustox.name: dustox
dustox.description:
Tends to be drawn to bonfires on dark nights. Difficult to chase
away from settlements because of the way it scatters highly
toxic scales.
dustox.title: Pok√©mon Polilla Ven.

ponyta.name: ponyta
ponyta.description:
These Pok√©mon live in herds out in the grassland. Newborn
foals lack their fiery manes, which will develop about an hour
after birth.
ponyta.title: Pok√©mon Caballo Fuego

rapidash.name: rapidash
rapidash.description:
Fiery mane aglow, Rapidash darts like an arrow across the land.
This prodigiously swift creature can traverse the vast region of
Hisui in a day and a half.
rapidash.title: Pok√©mon Caballo Fuego

eevee.name: Eevee
eevee.description:
Harbors the potential to evolve into manifold forms.
Within Eevee lies the key to the mysteries of Pok√©mon
evolution‚ÄîI'm certain of it.
eevee.title: Pok√©mon Evoluci√≥n

vaporeon.name: vaporeon
vaporeon.description: Seg√∫n nuestros an√°lisis, su estructura celular es similar a las mol√©culas de agua, lo que le permite mimetizarse al sumergirse. Tal vez sea el origen de los cuentos de sirenas.
vaporeon.title: Pok√©mon Burbuja

jolteon.name: jolteon
jolteon.description:
Bristles its fur into sharp, needlelike points when enraged.
One can hear electricity crackle in its breath when it exhales.
jolteon.title: Pok√©mon Rel√°mpago

flareon.name: flareon
flareon.description:
Flames burn within a saclike organ inside this Pok√©mon.
When Flareon inhales, these flames grow in intensity, reaching
a mighty 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
flareon.title: Pok√©mon Llama

espeon.name: espeon
espeon.description:
Wields an arcane power with which it can predict the weather
and even people's thoughts. When bathed in sunshine, the
scarlet orb on its brow glows and builds energy.
espeon.title: Pok√©mon Sol

umbreon.name: umbreon
umbreon.description:
It is most active in the wee hours of the night, when moonlight
bathes the land. Its large eyes can pierce the darkness and
perceive prey with absolute clarity.
umbreon.title: Pok√©mon Luz Lunar

leafeon.name: leafeon
leafeon.description:
Cells similar to those of plants have been found in its fur.
Its hard tail can fell a large tree with one stroke, and the tail's
sharpness exceeds even that of a sword crafted by a master.
leafeon.title: Pok√©mon Verdor

glaceon.name: glaceon
glaceon.description:
Glaceon is able to lower its body temperature very quickly.
It freezes the atmosphere, creating diamond dust that glitters
like gems while it flutters and dances around.
glaceon.title: Pok√©mon Nieve Fresca

sylveon.name: sylveon
sylveon.description:
It emits a soothing aura from its ribbon-shaped organs. It wraps
these appendages around quarrelers to instantly restore calm to
the situation.
sylveon.title: Pok√©mon V√≠nculo

zubat.name: zubat
zubat.description:
Makes its home in gloomy caves. Atrophied eyes have left this
Pok√©mon blind, so it scans its surroundings via sound waves that
it emits from its mouth as it flies.
zubat.title: Pok√©mon Murci√©lago

golbat.name: golbat
golbat.description:
It sinks its sharp fangs into other creatures and slurps up their
blood. A closer look at the fangs reveals that they are hollow
and akin to straws.
golbat.title: Pok√©mon Murci√©lago

crobat.name: crobat
crobat.description:
Its hind limbs have become another set of wings. Crobat
expertly maneuvers its four wings to dart in exquisite fashion
through even the most confined caves without losing any speed.
crobat.title: Pok√©mon Murci√©lago

drifloon.name: drifloon
drifloon.description:
Said to lure away young children and carry them off to the
afterlife. Some whisper that Drifloon are formed of reincarnated
human souls, but these rumors are as yet unconfirmed.
drifloon.title: Pok√©mon Globo

drifblim.name: drifblim
drifblim.description:
It drifts along at dusk, perfectly silent. Its transient, melancholy
aspect touches some people deeply‚Äîevery so often, one will
come upon a song or poem devoted to Drifblim.
drifblim.title: Pok√©mon Dirigible

kricketot.name: kricketot
kricketot.description:
When the trees take on new hues, more of these Pok√©mon
appear. The tone they create by striking their antennae together
resembles that of the marimba, an instrument of foreign lands.
kricketot.title: Pok√©mon Grillo

kricketune.name: kricketune
kricketune.description:
It uses its cutlass-like arms to produce sound, the melody of
which varies from individual to individual. It is a worthwhile
endeavor to seek out one's favorite tunes.
kricketune.title: Pok√©mon Grillo

buizel.name: buizel
buizel.description:
It moves freely in the water by spinning its forked tail for
propulsion. The resemblance to the screw of a steamboat
is coincidental.
buizel.title: Pok√©mon Nutria Mar.

floatzel.name: floatzel
floatzel.description:
Has a long, rather splendid flotation sac, which prevents
Floatzel from drowning even in stormy seas. One might glimpse
this species around fishing hamlets from time to time.
floatzel.title: Pok√©mon Nutria Mar.

burmy.name: burmy
burmy.description:
If its cloak is even slightly damaged, Burmy will immediately
repair it with whatever is close at hand. The Pok√©mon within the
cloak is scrawny and vulnerable to the cold.
burmy.title: Pok√©mon Larva

mothim.name: mothim
mothim.description:
Scatters steel-colored scales as it flaps its wings. Despite
being observed feeding primarily on the nectar of flowers,
Mothim is not often seen around flower gardens.
mothim.title: Pok√©mon Polilla

geodude.name: geodude
geodude.description:
Makes its home in mountainous regions, using its arms to climb
along harsh mountain roads. Can be troublesome‚Äîcarelessly
kicking one will cause it to fly into a rage and chase after you.
geodude.title: Pok√©mon Roca

graveler.name: graveler
graveler.description:
Dwells in holes dug into sheer walls of stone. It enjoys rolling
down slopes as though it were a boulder during a rockfall,
so keep an eye upward while traversing mountain roads.
graveler.title: Pok√©mon Roca

golem.name: golem
golem.description:
The rocklike shell is shed each year. The cast-off shell then
crumbles, reverting to a mass of soil, which can be spread across
fields to promote crop growth.
golem.title: Pok√©mon Megat√≥n

stantler.name: stantler
stantler.description:
Its strangely shaped antlers have the power to bewitch those
who see them. Medicine made by grinding up the black orbs
from fallen antlers is an effective treatment for insomnia.
stantler.title: Pok√©mon Gran Cuerno

wyrdeer.name: wyrdeer
wyrdeer.description:
The black orbs shine with an uncanny light when the Pok√©mon is
erecting invisible barriers. The fur shed from its beard retains
heat well and is a highly useful material for winter clothing.

munchlax.name: munchlax
munchlax.description:
Its robust stomach allows it to nonchalantly devour even rotted
matter. It pays frequent visits to villages, seeking out food
scraps intended for compost.
munchlax.title: Pok√©mon Comil√≥n

snorlax.name: snorlax
snorlax.description:
This glutton appears in villages without warning and devours the
entirety of their rice granaries‚Äîsuch occurrences have long been
counted among the gravest of disasters.
snorlax.title: Pok√©mon Dormir

paras.name: paras
paras.description:
Sometimes seen at the foot of trees in humid forests.
The mushrooms on its back‚Äîcalled tochukaso‚Äîare not present
on infant specimens and instead emerge as Paras matures.
paras.title: Pok√©mon Hongo

parasect.name: parasect
parasect.description:
Mushroom-lacking specimens of this Pok√©mon lie unmoving in
the forest, lending credence to the hypothesis that the large
mushroom is in control of Parasect's actions.
parasect.title: Pok√©mon Hongo

pichu.name: pichu
pichu.description:
Pichu stores electricity in the sacs on its cheeks but discharges it
inadvertently when agitated or excited. Being yet immature,
the Pok√©mon's handling of electricity is rather inept.
pichu.title: Pok√©mon Ratoncito

pikachu.name: pikachu
pikachu.description:
Possesses cheek sacs in which it stores electricity. This clever
forest-dweller roasts tough berries with an electric shock before
consuming them.
pikachu.title: Pok√©mon Rat√≥n

raichu.name: raichu
raichu.description:
It can discharge bursts of electricity exceeding 100,000 volts‚Äî
a single strike with that amount of power would incapacitate one
of the Copperajah of my homeland.
raichu.title: Pok√©mon Rat√≥n

abra.name: abra
abra.description:
Spends 18 hours of the day sleeping. Even while asleep, Abra
can control its psychic powers‚Äîshould danger approach, the
Pok√©mon will simply teleport away.
abra.title: Pok√©mon Psi

kadabra.name: kadabra
kadabra.description:
There are rumors that a child with mystical powers became
a Kadabra; however, this remains unverified. I suspect that
the spoon Kadabra holds enhances its brain waves.
kadabra.title: Pok√©mon Psi

alakazam.name: alakazam
alakazam.description:
The longer Alakazam lives, the larger and heavier its head
becomes. Our tests have shown that the strength of its psychic
powers correlates positively to the weight of its head.
alakazam.title: Pok√©mon Psi

chimchar.name: chimchar
chimchar.description:
Full of vigor and always in high spirits. It was once known by the
name ‚ÄùLantern-Tail‚Äù and feared as some kind of apparition.
chimchar.title: Pok√©mon Chimpanc√©

monferno.name: monferno
monferno.description:
The deeper the blue on its face, the more powerful it will grow
to become. It leaps about every which way and lands powerful
blows against its opponents with the flame on its tail.
monferno.title: Pok√©mon Juguet√≥n

infernape.name: infernape
infernape.description:
A tall, hardy Pok√©mon with a dazzling appearance. It shrouds
itself in flame and battles as if engaged in dance‚Äîtruly a sight
to behold.
infernape.title: Pok√©mon Llama

buneary.name: buneary
buneary.description:
My hypothesis as to why Buneary rolls up its ears is that its
hearing is far too keen. I surmise that the Pok√©mon protects its
hearing by limiting the sound that may enter its ears.
buneary.title: Pok√©mon Conejo

lopunny.name: lopunny
lopunny.description:
Its fur is warm and yet remarkably light. This Pok√©mon kicks as
though it were a master of karate, driving back its opponents
with ease.
lopunny.title: Pok√©mon Conejo

cherubi.name: cherubi
cherubi.description:
Once the fruit growing alongside the main body is large and
plump, Cherubi will use the nutrients within to evolve. The fruit
then detaches, becoming nourishment for other creatures.
cherubi.title: Pok√©mon Cereza

cherrim.name: cherrim
cherrim.description:
Motionless, save for the occasional quiver. A rich array of
Pok√©mon can be found gathered around it, drawn by the
scent exuded from Cherrim's folded petals.
cherrim.title: Pok√©mon Floraci√≥n

psyduck.name: psyduck
psyduck.description:
Suffers perpetual headaches. If the agony grows too great,
Psyduck's latent power erupts, contrary to Psyduck's intent.
Ergo, I am exploring ways to ease the pain.
psyduck.title: Pok√©mon Pato

golduck.name: golduck
golduck.description:
Its body is strong, and it has webbing on its hands and feet.
Golduck can swim easily through rough seas, clawing its way
through the high waves.
golduck.title: Pok√©mon Pato

combee.name: combee
combee.description:
They swear fealty to a queen Pok√©mon and work diligently to
gather nectar. Each swarm produces a different flavor of honey.
combee.title: Pok√©mon Abejita

vespiquen.name: vespiquen
vespiquen.description:
Commands its subjects to build its hive. It will dispatch any
interlopers who dare sneak into its nest and use them as
nourishment for itself.
vespiquen.title: Pok√©mon Colmena

scyther.name: scyther
scyther.description:
The large, wickedly sharp scythes on its forearms are truly
fearsome weapons. Prey's attempts to flee are unfailingly
thwarted by this Pok√©mon's nimble motions.
scyther.title: Pok√©mon Mantis

kleavor.name: kleavor
kleavor.description:
A violent creature that fells towering trees with its crude axes
and shields itself with hard stone. If one should chance upon
this Pok√©mon in the wilds, one's only recourse is to flee.

scizor.name: scizor
scizor.description:
Evolved by way of a curious item. The shell covering its body
has been shown to be stronger than forged steel.
scizor.title: Pok√©mon Tenaza

heracross.name: heracross
heracross.description:
This Pok√©mon has an unparalleled horn. Heracross itself
demonstrates tremendous power‚Äîit's capable of throwing
several people trained in the traditional arts of war at once.
heracross.title: Pok√©mon Cuerno

mime-jr.name: mime-jr
mime-jr.description:
Known to turn up in bustling marketplaces now and again.
It mimics people much as a child would, then watches how they
react, eyes sparkling.
mime-jr.title: Pok√©mon Mimo

mr-mime.name: mr-mime
mr-mime.description:
The behavior of this clown-like Pok√©mon reminds one of
pantomime. It creates invisible walls using a force emitted
from its fingertips.
mr-mime.title: Pok√©mon Barrera

aipom.name: aipom
aipom.description:
This treetop dweller possesses a tail as dexterous as a hand.
Ancient writings describe this Pok√©mon as a one-armed oddity.
aipom.title: Pok√©mon Cola Larga

ambipom.name: ambipom
ambipom.description:
To affirm their kinship, members of this species will form a ring
by linking their newly doubled tails together. On rare occasions,
humans have been accepted into such rings.
ambipom.title: Pok√©mon Cola Larga

magikarp.name: magikarp
magikarp.description:
A feeble, pitiful imbecile of a Pok√©mon that is nonetheless very
hardy. Unperturbed by turbid water, it can be found living in all
sorts of places.
magikarp.title: Pok√©mon Pez

gyarados.name: gyarados
gyarados.description:
I suspect this Pok√©mon to be the true identity of a dragon
written of in ancient texts, which claimed that it razed an entire
village with white-hot beams from its maw.
gyarados.title: Pok√©mon Atrocidad

shellos.name: shellos
shellos.description:
Found in abundance on seashores bordering warm waters.
Shellos are unexpectedly friendly and will crawl toward any
person they see. Take care not to get coated in mucus!
shellos.title: Pok√©mon Babosa Marina

gastrodon.name: gastrodon
gastrodon.description:
Eats beach sand for nourishment. Should one Gastrodon
encounter another of a different color, a fierce battle will inevitably ensue.
gastrodon.title: Pok√©mon Babosa Marina

qwilfish.name: qwilfish
qwilfish.description:
Fishers detest this troublesome Pok√©mon because it sprays
poison from its spines, getting it everywhere. A different form
of Qwilfish lives in other regions.
qwilfish.title: Pok√©mon Globo

overqwil.name: overqwil
overqwil.description:
Its lancelike spikes and savage temperament have earned it the
nickname ‚Äùsea fiend.‚Äù It slurps up poison to nourish itself.

happiny.name: happiny
happiny.description:
In imitation of Chansey, it keeps a round stone tucked into its
belly pouch and cherishes it dearly. It gets along well with
children and will sometimes play house with them for fun.
happiny.title: Pok√©mon Casita

chansey.name: chansey
chansey.description: This purehearted Pok√©mon shares its eggs with the injured.
chansey.title: Pok√©mon Huevo

blissey.name: blissey
blissey.description:
A kindhearted Pok√©mon that will care for any sick person or
Pok√©mon until their health improves. The eggs it lays are
delicious and bring good fortune to those who eat them.
blissey.title: Pok√©mon Felicidad

budew.name: budew
budew.description:
When the sun's light strengthens, the bud atop this Pok√©mon's
head opens. This is a sign to the people that the harsh winter is
over, and the season of budding has begun.
budew.title: Pok√©mon Brote

roselia.name: roselia
roselia.description:
Though beautiful, it has highly poisonous thorns. There is an old
tradition in my homeland wherein one would send these thorns
to an opponent to challenge them to a duel.
roselia.title: Pok√©mon Espina

roserade.name: roserade
roserade.description:
Hidden within the bouquet on each hand are thorned whips
loaded with virulent poison. Roserade moves gracefully as it
corners its prey and mercilessly lashes them with its whips.
roserade.title: Pok√©mon Ramillete

carnivine.name: carnivine
carnivine.description:
Though this is a plant Pok√©mon, it has a gluttonous and unruly
temperament. Carnivine attacks its prey with its cavernous maw
wide open.
carnivine.title: Pok√©mon Caza Bichos

petilil.name: petilil
petilil.description:
The leaves on its head are highly valued for medicinal purposes.
Dry the leaves in the sun, boil them, and then drink the bitter
decoction for remarkably effective relief from fatigue.
petilil.title: Pok√©mon Bulbo

lilligant.name: lilligant
lilligant.description:
I suspect that its well-developed legs are the result of a life
spent on mountains covered in deep snow. The scent it exudes
from its flower crown heartens those in proximity.
lilligant.title: Pok√©mon Adornofloral

tangela.name: tangela
tangela.description:
It is cloaked entirely in blue vines, preventing any glimpse of
its true identity. The vines impart a refreshing sensation when
chewed‚Äîthey're useful as a spice.
tangela.title: Pok√©mon Enredadera

tangrowth.name: tangrowth
tangrowth.description:
Draped with long vines, it resembles a shrub in appearance.
It swings bundles of vines as though they were arms, wrapping
them around prey to ensnare them.
tangrowth.title: Pok√©mon Enredadera

barboach.name: barboach
barboach.description:
Makes its home in swamps with murky water. The poor visibility
hides this Pok√©mon from predators, and the slime on its body
makes grasping it difficult.
barboach.title: Pok√©mon Bigotudo

whiscash.name: whiscash
whiscash.description:
Strikes its caudal fin against the swamp bed to shake the ground
and startle its prey. It will then swallow the fleeing prey whole.
People mistook this behavior as the cause of earthquakes.
whiscash.title: Pok√©mon Bigotudo

croagunk.name: croagunk
croagunk.description:
A poison wielder with a dastardly personality. Despite such
qualities, this species is afforded a measure of popularity due
to its peculiar cry and comical features.
croagunk.title: Pok√©mon Boca T√≥xica

toxicroak.name: toxicroak
toxicroak.description:
Its crimson claws contain a virulent toxin. This toxin can be made
into a tonic by diluting it, mixing it with several types of wild
grass, and boiling it down over two days.
toxicroak.title: Pok√©mon Boca T√≥xica

ralts.name: ralts
ralts.description:
Tends to prefer people with a chipper disposition to those who
are gloomy, but it has shown no discrimination with regard to
age or gender. Needs more research.
ralts.title: Pok√©mon Sensible

kirlia.name: kirlia
kirlia.description:
It resembles a maiden in appearance, but it wields strange
powers to project visions of paradise. I suspect the crimson
ornaments on its head are the key to its abilities.
kirlia.title: Pok√©mon Sensorio

gardevoir.name: gardevoir
gardevoir.description:
It will dedicate itself to defending a master it has come to
adore. Its pure white dress, reminiscent of those worn by ladies
of nobility, is the dress of one who is willing to risk their life.
gardevoir.title: Pok√©mon Envolvente

gallade.name: gallade
gallade.description:
The blades extending from its elbows are sharper than the
finest swords. Its swordsmanship, albeit self-taught, is
astonishingly impressive.
gallade.title: Pok√©mon Cuchilla

yanma.name: yanma
yanma.description:
Its frail wings are so thin that one can see clear through them.
However, during flight these wings exhibit the power to churn
air with force enough to launch a house skyward.
yanma.title: Pok√©mon Ala Clara

yanmega.name: yanmega
yanmega.description:
Extremely violent. When hunting, it wastes none of its energy,
aiming only for prey's most vulnerable spots. Any who manage
to tame this Pok√©mon must be of incredible bravery.
yanmega.title: Pok√©mon Lib√©lula

hippopotas.name: hippopotas
hippopotas.description:
Though large and languid, Hippopotas is difficult to detect
due to its tendency to burrow into and lurk beneath the soil.
When agitated or excited, it expels sand from its nostrils.
hippopotas.title: Pok√©mon Hipo

hippowdon.name: hippowdon
hippowdon.description:
Short-tempered and easily moved to violence. It whips up
whirlwinds of sand to crush its foes' spirits, then goes in for
the attack.
hippowdon.title: Pok√©mon Peso Pesado

pachirisu.name: pachirisu
pachirisu.description:
A species related to the Pikachu line. Though Pachirisu is a calm
Pok√©mon, it still presents a danger should one touch its
electrified tail or cheeks.
pachirisu.title: Pok√©mon Ardillalec

stunky.name: stunky
stunky.description:
The poison that gushes from its aft end is accompanied by an
utterly evil-smelling odor with such potency that one whiff can
induce memory loss.
stunky.title: Pok√©mon Mofeta

skuntank.name: skuntank
skuntank.description:
Sprays a poisonous fluid to take down prey. Sometimes, unable
to stomach the stench of its own fluid, it leaves the bested
prey uneaten.
skuntank.title: Pok√©mon Mofeta

teddiursa.name: teddiursa
teddiursa.description:
It licks its paws because of the sweet honey that has soaked into
them. It is cunning, stealing into the nests of Combee and taking
for itself the honey that the Combee have amassed.
teddiursa.title: Pok√©mon Osito

ursaring.name: ursaring
ursaring.description:
When the cold season arrives in Hisui, this Pok√©mon will wander
fields and mountains alike in search of its favorite berries.
Ursaring's hunger during this time makes it a ferocious danger.
ursaring.title: Pok√©mon Hibernante

ursaluna.name: ursaluna
ursaluna.description:
I believe it was Hisui's swampy terrain that gave Ursaluna its
burly physique and newfound capacity to manipulate peat
at will.

goomy.name: goomy
goomy.description:
Goomy hides away in the shade of trees, where it's nice and
humid. If the slime coating its body dries out, the Pok√©mon
instantly becomes lethargic.
goomy.title: Pok√©mon Molusco

sliggoo.name: sliggoo
sliggoo.description:
A creature given to melancholy. I suspect its metallic shell
developed as a result of the mucus on its skin reacting with
the iron in Hisui's water.
sliggoo.title: Pok√©mon Molusco

goodra.name: goodra
goodra.description:
Able to freely control the hardness of its metallic shell.
It loathes solitude and is extremely clingy‚Äîit will fume and
run riot if those dearest to it ever leave its side.
goodra.title: Pok√©mon Drag√≥n

onix.name: onix
onix.description:
This chain of immense stones resembles a giant serpent. Tremors
shake the earth above as it burrows deep beneath the ground,
feeding on boulders as it goes.
onix.title: Pok√©mon Serpiente Roca

steelix.name: steelix
steelix.description:
This Pok√©mon evolved through use of a strange item. Its body is
coated with steel powder and notably hard‚Äînot even diamond
can leave so much as a scratch.
steelix.title: Pok√©mon Serpiente F√©rrea

rhyhorn.name: rhyhorn
rhyhorn.description:
Ludicrously strong‚Äîwhen it butts heads with a mountain, it is
the mountain that shatters. But its short legs struggle with turns,
and it is incapable of stopping unless it collides with something.
rhyhorn.title: Pok√©mon Clavos

rhydon.name: rhydon
rhydon.description:
Rapidly rotates its horn to bore through bedrock. It swaggers
around volcanic regions, protected from the lava's heat by its
tough, armorlike hide.
rhydon.title: Pok√©mon Taladro

rhyperior.name: rhyperior
rhyperior.description:
This Pok√©mon evolved through use of a curious item. Its rocklike
hide is composed of a mysterious substance and can withstand a
blow from a masterwork sword with nary a scratch.
rhyperior.title: Pok√©mon Taladro

bonsly.name: bonsly
bonsly.description:
Its tears elicit sympathy from those who see them, but do
not be deceived! This expulsion of body water is merely a
physiological mechanism for keeping itself in good health.
bonsly.title: Pok√©mon Bons√°i

sudowoodo.name: sudowoodo
sudowoodo.description:
Though it pretends to be a tree, it fails to fool even children.
To the touch, its body feels more like rock than tree bark.
Sudowoodo's extreme aversion to water merits special note.
sudowoodo.title: Pok√©mon Imitaci√≥n

lickitung.name: lickitung
lickitung.description:
Wields its long tongue deftly, as though it were an arm.
The Pok√©mon's viscous saliva, once it has been collected and
boiled down, yields a strong and highly useful adhesive.
lickitung.title: Pok√©mon Lametazo

lickilicky.name: lickilicky
lickilicky.description:
Its tongue can extend and contract freely, and it is capable of
reaching lengths over 10 times Lickilicky's height. Beware of the
saliva, as it contains corrosive elements.
lickilicky.title: Pok√©mon Lametazo

togepi.name: togepi
togepi.description:
This ovate creature is frequently mistaken for a moving egg
when encountered out in the fields or in the mountains.
Its guileless smile soothes the soul.
togepi.title: Pok√©mon Bolaclavos

togetic.name: togetic
togetic.description:
No records exist of Togetic being seen in the wilds. Rumors
abound that it evolves under the loving care of a trusted human
companion, upon whom the Pok√©mon then bestows great joy.
togetic.title: Pok√©mon Felicidad

togekiss.name: togekiss
togekiss.description:
Scant few have ever sighted this Pok√©mon. After studying what
literature remains, I am certain Togekiss will reveal itself when
peace reigns in the land.
togekiss.title: Pok√©mon Festejo

turtwig.name: turtwig
turtwig.description:
This Pok√©mon becomes more energetic the more sunlight there
is. The part resembling a shell is similar to silt and is slightly
damp and warm to the touch.
turtwig.title: Pok√©mon Hojita

grotle.name: grotle
grotle.description:
Appears where there is clean spring water. The fruit that grows
on the shrubs on its shell is sweet, nutritious, and truly delicious.
grotle.title: Pok√©mon Arboleda

torterra.name: torterra
torterra.description:
This remarkable, large-bodied Pok√©mon would serve beautifully
as borrowed scenery for a garden, and its strength is peerless.
Torterra roams the wilderness in search of clean water.
torterra.title: Pok√©mon Continente

porygon.name: porygon
porygon.description:
It has no discernible heartbeat and does not seem to draw
breath, and yet it appears to function without issue. I cannot
even begin to explain this utterly bizarre anomaly.
porygon.title: Pok√©mon Virtual

porygon2.name: porygon2
porygon2.description:
A bizarre item caused this Pok√©mon to evolve. While it now
exhibits many new gestures and expressions, its biology
remains inscrutable.
porygon2.title: Pok√©mon Virtual

porygon-z.name: porygon-z
porygon-z.description:
A curious item induced this evolution. The Pok√©mon's offensive
capabilities have greatly increased, but the strangeness of its
behavior has magnified in equal measure. This worries me.
porygon-z.title: Pok√©mon Virtual

gastly.name: gastly
gastly.description:
Gaseous and completely impalpable. Also highly dangerous‚Äî
inhaling part of its poisonous body will cause one to
faint instantly.
gastly.title: Pok√©mon Gas

haunter.name: haunter
haunter.description:
This frightful, malevolent spirit can glide through walls,
appearing wherever it likes. According to rumor, victims of
a Haunter's lick will wither to death day by day.
haunter.title: Pok√©mon Gas

gengar.name: gengar
gengar.description:
Possesses potential victims' shadows in an effort to steal away
the victims' lives. If your shadow begins to laugh, you must take
hold of a protective charm posthaste!
gengar.title: Pok√©mon Sombra

spiritomb.name: spiritomb
spiritomb.description:
It lays curses by thinking wicked thoughts. Writings tell that this
Pok√©mon was born out of the assembly of five score and eight
malevolent spirits.
spiritomb.title: Pok√©mon Prohibido

murkrow.name: murkrow
murkrow.description:
Widely shunned as a bearer of ill fortune. Upon crossing paths
with this creature, I've been told one must chant ‚ÄùWorkrum,
Workrum‚Äîbad luck, don't come‚Äù as a protective incantation.
murkrow.title: Pok√©mon Oscuridad

honchkrow.name: honchkrow
honchkrow.description:
One cry from this Pok√©mon, and a murder of Murkrow come
flying. At such times, one would think the curtain of night had
fallen, plunging the world into jet-black darkness.
honchkrow.title: Pok√©mon Gran Jefe

unown.name: unown
unown.description:
It is hard to believe these strangely shaped Pok√©mon are truly
living creatures. I've pointed out that the species' many forms
resemble writing from other lands; no one will take me seriously.
unown.title: Pok√©mon S√≠mbolo

spheal.name: spheal
spheal.description:
During the season when drift ice approaches the shore, Spheal
prefers living on the ice‚Äîwhere fewer predators lurk‚Äîrather
than the land. Its fur retains heat superbly and resists harsh cold.
spheal.title: Pok√©mon Aplauso

sealeo.name: sealeo
sealeo.description:
Its white whiskers are very sensitive. Sealeo will balance Spheal
on the tip of its nose, checking its scent and its feel to be sure
the Spheal is healthy.
sealeo.title: Pok√©mon Rodabola

walrein.name: walrein
walrein.description:
Its thick tusks are strong enough to shatter drift ice. They have
been known to break, but they will grow back by the next year.
The Hisui region is well known for these broken tusks.
walrein.title: Pok√©mon Rompehielo

remoraid.name: remoraid
remoraid.description:
Spits water from its mouth with incredible accuracy. It captures
Burmy by shooting them down off the branches from which
they dangle.
remoraid.title: Pok√©mon Reactor

octillery.name: octillery
octillery.description:
While Octillery still shoots water from its mouth, the drastic
anatomical difference between it and Remoraid meant that for
a long time, no one believed the former evolved from the latter.
octillery.title: Pok√©mon Reactor

skorupi.name: skorupi
skorupi.description:
Its claws are not only razor-sharp but poisonous, making Skorupi
a highly dangerous Pok√©mon. It seems to be weakened by cold
temperatures, however.
skorupi.title: Pok√©mon Escorpi√≥n

drapion.name: drapion
drapion.description:
Has a brutish, ferocious temperament. With immense strength
and a sturdy shell off which swords will bounce, it rampages
about and wreaks havoc.
drapion.title: Pok√©mon Escorpiogro

growlithe.name: growlithe
growlithe.description:
They patrol their territory in pairs. I believe the igneous
rock components in the fur of this species are the result of
volcanic activity in its habitat.
growlithe.title: Pok√©mon Perrito

arcanine.name: arcanine
arcanine.description:
Snaps at its foes with fangs cloaked in blazing flame. Despite its
bulk, it deftly feints every which way, leading opponents on a
deceptively merry chase as it all but dances around them.
arcanine.title: Pok√©mon Leyenda

glameow.name: glameow
glameow.description:
Bewitches humans with its helical tail and piercing gaze.
Its hidden claws are quite sharp as well, making this Pok√©mon
an exceedingly tricky opponent if antagonized.
glameow.title: Pok√©mon Gastuto

purugly.name: purugly
purugly.description:
Though impudent and difficult to tame, Purugly enjoys great
popularity due to its fur, the beauty of which surpasses
even velveteen.
purugly.title: Pok√©mon Tigre Gato

machop.name: machop
machop.description:
Though as small as a child, it has strength enough to easily throw
a well-built adult. Striving to become ever stronger, Machop
trains by carrying a Graveler on its shoulders.
machop.title: Pok√©mon Superpoder

machoke.name: machoke
machoke.description:
A sturdy creature boasting a robust physique and boundless
stamina. Loves training above all else and voluntarily assists with
tasks such as construction and clearing land.
machoke.title: Pok√©mon Superpoder

machamp.name: machamp
machamp.description:
In close combat, its four arms afford it offensive and defensive
supremacy. In but a blink, this valiant Pok√©mon can overwhelm
its foes with more than 1,000 blows from its fists.
machamp.title: Pok√©mon Superpoder

chatot.name: chatot
chatot.description:
A versatile performer skilled in the imitation of human speech.
It is said that older, more experienced Chatot can even
understand the meaning of the words they mimic.
chatot.title: Pok√©mon Corchea

duskull.name: duskull
duskull.description:
I've heard that the children of Hisui all begin to behave once
they've been told the story of how this Pok√©mon roams about
before the witching hour to spirit away misbehaving children.
duskull.title: Pok√©mon R√©quiem

dusclops.name: dusclops
dusclops.description:
There are rumors that peeking inside its bandage-wrapped body
will cause one to get pulled in through the gaps between the
bandages, never to return. I've been too scared to verify.
dusclops.title: Pok√©mon Atrayente

dusknoir.name: dusknoir
dusknoir.description:
Comes to those whose lives have come to an end and escorts
their souls to the afterlife. Known to mistakenly take the souls of
those who yet have life left in them, albeit rarely.
dusknoir.title: Pok√©mon Grilletes

piplup.name: piplup
piplup.description:
Prefers cold climes and appears along coasts. It's an adorable
little thing‚Äîas cute as any child‚Äîbut it's also prideful, unwilling
to accept handouts from people.
piplup.title: Pok√©mon Ping√ºino

prinplup.name: prinplup
prinplup.description:
It swims gracefully through the frigid sea and sings with a voice
like the roaring tide. It has powerful, sturdy wings and dignity
to match.
prinplup.title: Pok√©mon Ping√ºino

empoleon.name: empoleon
empoleon.description:
Since ancient times, it has been revered by the people of Hisui,
who call it the Master of the Waves. Its wings are a match for
even master-crafted blades.
empoleon.title: Pok√©mon Emperador

mantyke.name: mantyke
mantyke.description:
Though ball-like in shape, this Pok√©mon is a proficient swimmer.
I have discovered that if a Mantyke spends much time with
schools of Remoraid, it will eventually achieve evolution.
mantyke.title: Pok√©mon Milano

mantine.name: mantine
mantine.description:
This calm and gentle Pok√©mon swims gracefully through the sea.
After building speed, it can leap out of the water. It is often
misidentified as a bird Pok√©mon due to this behavior.
mantine.title: Pok√©mon Milano

basculin.name: basculin
basculin.description:
Though it differs from other Basculin in several respects,
including demeanor‚Äîthis one is gentle‚ÄîI have categorized
it as a regional form given the vast array of shared qualities.
basculin.title: Pok√©mon Violento

basculegion.name: basculegion
basculegion.description:
Clads itself in the souls of comrades that perished before
fulfilling their goals of journeying upstream. No other species
throughout all Hisui's rivers is Basculegion's equal.

vulpix.name: vulpix
vulpix.description:
In its belly burns a fire, which Vulpix spits out in the form of
fireballs. When young, this Pok√©mon has but one white tail.
As the Pok√©mon matures, this single tail splits into six.
vulpix.title: Pok√©mon Zorro

ninetales.name: ninetales
ninetales.description:
The coat of gleaming golden fur is quite magnificent.
This species is said to store sacred power in its nine long tails
and to live for a millennium.
ninetales.title: Pok√©mon Zorro

tentacool.name: tentacool
tentacool.description:
They fire beams from the glassy, magenta orbs that resemble
eyes atop their heads, and they drift in shallow seas. During low
tide, they can sometimes be found on beaches, desiccated.
tentacool.title: Pok√©mon Medusa

tentacruel.name: tentacruel
tentacruel.description:
It has 80 tentacles, each with a venomous tip. These tentacles
are also extendible, lengthening when Tentacruel attempts to
catch prey. Use caution.
tentacruel.title: Pok√©mon Medusa

finneon.name: finneon
finneon.description:
What a gorgeous sight this Pok√©mon is as it swims with its long,
pink-painted caudal fins fluttering behind it. Finneon's beautiful
appearance has led to its nickname: ‚Äùfinery fish.‚Äù
finneon.title: Pok√©mon Pez Ala

lumineon.name: lumineon
lumineon.description:
Uses its gleaming fins to hunt its prey. The view of Lumineon
schooling near the surface of the sea at night is breathtaking‚Äî
it's as though there were shining stars right there.
lumineon.title: Pok√©mon Ne√≥n

magby.name: magby
magby.description:
This Pok√©mon lives in volcanic areas. With each breath, sparks
spurt from its mouth and nose. When Magby is in good health,
its flames gain a yellow tint.
magby.title: Pok√©mon Ascuas

magmar.name: magmar
magmar.description:
Legend has it that this Pok√©mon was born from the crater of a
volcano. When wounded, it bathes in lava to heal its body, much
as one would soak in a hot spring.
magmar.title: Pok√©mon Escupefuego

magmortar.name: magmortar
magmortar.description:
Use of a strange item caused this Pok√©mon to evolve. Fireballs
launched from the ends of its tubelike arms are hot enough to
melt an iron pot in an instant.
magmortar.title: Pok√©mon Explosi√≥n

magnemite.name: magnemite
magnemite.description:
A bizarre Pok√©mon with but a single eye embedded in an iron
sphere. I suspect this creature levitates due to the magnetism it
emits from its arms, which resemble horseshoe-shaped magnets.
magnemite.title: Pok√©mon Im√°n

magneton.name: magneton
magneton.description:
Three Magnemite gathered to evolve into this Pok√©mon.
The source of much vexation on my part, as its powerful
magnetism destroys my research equipment.
magneton.title: Pok√©mon Im√°n

magnezone.name: magnezone
magnezone.description:
I theorize that a special magnetic field influenced this Pok√©mon,
changing its molecular structure and causing it to evolve. It emits
strange radio waves toward space from its antenna.
magnezone.title: Pok√©mon Magn√©tico

bronzor.name: bronzor
bronzor.description:
Floats using a mysterious energy. The pattern engraved upon its
back is held as sacred and can sometimes be found in imagery
from ancient cemeteries and other such timeworn places.
bronzor.title: Pok√©mon Bronce

bronzong.name: bronzong
bronzong.description:
Some believe that its bell-like cry opens holes to another world.
It has been revered as a deity since ancient times.
bronzong.title: Pok√©mon Campana Bronce

elekid.name: elekid
elekid.description:
They generate electricity by spinning their arms. During a
thunderstorm, if one hears the lively voices of children out in the
wilderness, what one is actually hearing are the voices of Elekid.
elekid.title: Pok√©mon El√©ctrico

electabuzz.name: electabuzz
electabuzz.description:
Feeds on electrical energy. During sudden showers beneath
looming thunderclouds, one can observe Electabuzz scaling tall
trees, where the Pok√©mon will then wait for lightning to strike.
electabuzz.title: Pok√©mon El√©ctrico

electivire.name: electivire
electivire.description:
Its evolution was induced by an unusual item, and its electrical
output rises along with its heart rate. From its tails, it can
unleash an electric current measuring 20,000 volts.
electivire.title: Pok√©mon Rayo

gligar.name: gligar
gligar.description:
Its tail is tipped by a thick, horrible stinger. To bring down prey,
it will first obscure their vision by covering their faces with its
body, and then it will use the stinger to inject them with venom.
gligar.title: Pok√©mon Escorpiala

gliscor.name: gliscor
gliscor.description:
It glides soundlessly on pitch-black wings and sinks sharp fangs
into the throat of its prey. It takes on a look of satisfaction once
it has entirely drained its prey of blood.
gliscor.title: Pok√©mon Colmicorpio

gible.name: gible
gible.description:
It nests in caves untouched by sunlight. Its sharp teeth may fall
out when worn away or after an impact, but they regrow within
a few days.
gible.title: Pok√©mon Terrascualo

gabite.name: gabite
gabite.description:
Though Gabite are usually of a violent disposition, when I gave
one a glass bead it had been eyeing covetously, it suddenly
became quite docile.
gabite.title: Pok√©mon Cueva

garchomp.name: garchomp
garchomp.description:
Soars across the heavens at blinding speed‚Äîa magnificent sight!
It has a feral disposition. Utmost caution is required if one
meets a Garchomp out in the wilds.
garchomp.title: Pok√©mon Mach

nosepass.name: nosepass
nosepass.description:
Once the people of Hisui discovered that its red nose always
points north, they grew to rely on it greatly when traveling afar.
The nose seems to work in a similar way to ancient compasses.
nosepass.title: Pok√©mon Br√∫jula

probopass.name: probopass
probopass.description:
It is able to emit powerful magnetism, allowing it control over
the iron sand that forms its luscious mustache. Using this iron
sand, Probopass forms hard stones with which it smites its prey.
probopass.title: Pok√©mon Br√∫jula

voltorb.name: voltorb
voltorb.description:
An enigmatic Pok√©mon that happens to bear a resemblance to a
Pok√© Ball. When excited, it discharges the electric current it has
stored in its belly, then lets out a great, uproarious laugh.
voltorb.title: Pok√©mon Bola

electrode.name: electrode
electrode.description:
The tissue on the surface of its body is curiously similar in
composition to an Apricorn. When irritated, this Pok√©mon lets
loose an electric current equal to 20 lightning bolts.
electrode.title: Pok√©mon Bola

rotom.name: rotom
rotom.description:
This bizarre Pok√©mon appears to be a will-o'-the-wisp powered
by electricity. Be wary, as Rotom is both smart and mischievous.
rotom.title: Pok√©mon Plasma

chingling.name: chingling
chingling.description:
This Pok√©mon gave me an excruciating headache when it
seemingly cried out without making a sound. Perhaps there are
some sounds that the human ear is simply incapable of hearing.
chingling.title: Pok√©mon Campana

chimecho.name: chimecho
chimecho.description:
Can emit waves of air powerful enough to knock out prey taller
than itself. I hypothesize that it amplifies the faint sound of wind
within its body.
chimecho.title: Pok√©mon Sonido Aire

misdreavus.name: misdreavus
misdreavus.description:
It conceals itself in darkness, sending chills up travelers' spines
with its childlike weeping. As it observes the frightened travelers
with glee, the red orbs upon its chest let off an eerie light.
misdreavus.title: Pok√©mon Chirrido

mismagius.name: mismagius
mismagius.description:
The incantations Mismagius chants can ward against misfortune,
so a custom exists of inviting it into one's home. Incur the
Pok√©mon's displeasure, however, and disaster will surely ensue.
mismagius.title: Pok√©mon M√°gico

cleffa.name: cleffa
cleffa.description:
In silhouette, they resemble twinkling starlight. When shooting
stars rain from the night sky, Cleffa gather in numbers and dance
as though they are indeed incarnations of the stars.
cleffa.title: Pok√©mon Estrella

clefairy.name: clefairy
clefairy.description:
It can be found in quiet mountain areas on a full moon's night.
Its dancing and its tiny, faintly glowing wings confer upon it a
lovely fairylike quality.
clefairy.title: Pok√©mon Hada

clefable.name: clefable
clefable.description:
Legend says that on clear, quiet nights, it listens for the voices
of its kin living on the moon. I, too, often think of my homeland,
so far away.
clefable.title: Pok√©mon Hada

sneasel.name: sneasel
sneasel.description:
Its sturdy, curved claws are ideal for traversing precipitous cliffs.
From the tips of these claws drips a venom that infiltrates the
nerves of any prey caught in Sneasel's grasp.
sneasel.title: Pok√©mon Garra Filo

sneasler.name: sneasler
sneasler.description:
Because of Sneasler's virulent poison and daunting physical
prowess, no other species could hope to best it on the frozen
highlands. Preferring solitude, this species does not form packs.

weavile.name: weavile
weavile.description:
This species corners prey as a pack, under the guidance of
a leader. Weavile displays increased cunning, leading me to
speculate that its evolution caused further brain development.
weavile.title: Pok√©mon Garra Filo

snorunt.name: snorunt
snorunt.description:
Arrives alongside the first snow. It's thought that homes Snorunt
visit will prosper for many generations. By tradition, one might
offer a lump of ice made from pure water at one's front door.
snorunt.title: Pok√©mon Gorro Nieve

glalie.name: glalie
glalie.description:
It covers its body with an armor of ice harder than steel. Uses its
breath to freeze prey, which it then devours as if they were
frozen desserts.
glalie.title: Pok√©mon Cara

froslass.name: froslass
froslass.description:
A Pok√©mon inhabited by the soul of a woman who died bearing
a grudge in the snowy mountains. Legends of Froslass placing
deathly curses on misbehaving men send shivers down my spine.
froslass.title: Pok√©mon Tierra Fr√≠a

cranidos.name: cranidos
cranidos.description:
An incredibly rare sight. They duel each other by ramming their
heads together, and the resulting sound echoes throughout the
area like the pealing of a bell.
cranidos.title: Pok√©mon Cabezazo

rampardos.name: rampardos
rampardos.description:
Very little is known about its biology. Can knock down massive
trees by smashing its beautiful, pearl-like crown against them.
rampardos.title: Pok√©mon Cabezazo

shieldon.name: shieldon
shieldon.description:
Much remains unknown about this Pok√©mon, as few have ever
seen it. However, we know that it is calm and dislikes conflict,
and it enjoys polishing its face against trees and rocks.
shieldon.title: Pok√©mon Escudo

bastiodon.name: bastiodon
bastiodon.description:
Its face is sturdy‚Äîas strong as diamond‚Äîand this hardness
offers a very stable defense. Much about this species is still
unknown, such as its natural habitat.
bastiodon.title: Pok√©mon Escudo

swinub.name: swinub
swinub.description:
Swinub excels at sniffing out mushrooms buried beneath grass or
snow. Since ancient times, the people of Hisui have often relied
upon this skill.
swinub.title: Pok√©mon Cerdo

piloswine.name: piloswine
piloswine.description:
The long fur of this Pok√©mon covers its eyes, ears, and even
limbs, allowing Piloswine to resist harshly frigid conditions.
The Pok√©mon's white tusks can be used to defeat its enemies.
piloswine.title: Pok√©mon Puerco

mamoswine.name: mamoswine
mamoswine.description:
This species reached its zenith during the period known as the
ice age. I suspect that Hisui's frigid climate is in harmony with
Mamoswine's constitution, thus awakening hidden potential.
mamoswine.title: Pok√©mon Doscolmillos

bergmite.name: bergmite
bergmite.description:
Lives on mountains blanketed in perennial snow. It freezes water
vapor in the air to make the ice helmet that it dons for defense.
bergmite.title: Pok√©mon T√©mpano

avalugg.name: avalugg
avalugg.description:
The armor of ice covering its lower jaw puts steel to shame and
can shatter rocks with ease. This Pok√©mon barrels along steep
mountain paths, cleaving through the deep snow.
avalugg.title: Pok√©mon Iceberg

snover.name: snover
snover.description:
One is likely to encounter this Pok√©mon while out in the snow.
There are stories of Snover appearing in human settlements but
doing no harm‚Äîrather, they bond with the children.
snover.title: Pok√©mon √Årbol Nieve

abomasnow.name: abomasnow
abomasnow.description:
A powerful Pok√©mon that can split huge boulders with ease.
Dislikes associating with others and chooses to live quietly deep
within the mountains, playing with the snow.
abomasnow.title: Pok√©mon √Årbol Nieve

zorua.name: Zorua
zorua.title: Pok√©mon Zorro Rencor
zorua.description: Es un alma difunta resucitada en Hisui que transforma su rencor en energ√≠a. Esta surge de su cabeza y adopta la forma de su oponente, disipando asi su inquina.

zoroark.name: Zoroark
zoroark.description: La revuelta melena blanca le hace parecer la personificaci√≥n de la muerte. Abate a sus rivales sin consideraci√≥n por su vida vali√©ndose de un profundo rencor que tambi√©n da√±a su cuerpo.
zoroark.title: Pok√©mon Maldizorro

rufflet.name: rufflet
rufflet.description:
Its chick-like looks belie its hotheadedness. It challenges its
parents at every opportunity, desperate to prove its strength.
rufflet.title: Pok√©mon Aguilucho

braviary.name: braviary
braviary.description:
Screaming a bloodcurdling battle cry, this huge and ferocious
bird Pok√©mon goes out on the hunt. It blasts lakes with shock
waves, then scoops up any prey that float to the water's surface.
braviary.title: Pok√©mon Aguerrido

riolu.name: riolu
riolu.description:
Though infantile in appearance, it has the mysterious ability to
read the minds of humans. The pure of heart are met with
Riolu's approval, while those of ill nature earn only its loathing.
riolu.title: Pok√©mon Emanaci√≥n

lucario.name: lucario
lucario.description:
A most gallant-looking creature. It emits energy waves and
controls them with precision, using them to sense even faraway
beings. I have given the name ‚Äùaura‚Äù to this power.
lucario.title: Pok√©mon Aura

uxie.name: uxie
uxie.description:
A Pok√©mon feared but also respected for stealing away the
memories of evildoers. I have found records that suggest Uxie
holds dominion over knowledge.
uxie.title: Pok√©mon Sabidur√≠a

mesprit.name: mesprit
mesprit.description:
Known as the Being of Emotion. In legend, this Pok√©mon was
feared, as any who showed disrespect would have their
emotions thrown into disarray.
mesprit.title: Pok√©mon Sensorio

azelf.name: azelf
azelf.description:
The dreaded Being of Willpower. Legends tell of this Pok√©mon
manipulating the will of its adversaries and turning them into
puppets of its own.
azelf.title: Pok√©mon Voluntad

heatran.name: heatran
heatran.description:
Stories tell of this Pok√©mon being birthed from the boiling
magma within Mount Coronet. Its molten-steel body holds
many mysteries.
heatran.title: Pok√©mon Domo Lava

regigigas.name: regigigas
regigigas.description:
According to legend, Regigigas pulled landmasses together and
bound them with rope to create the continent of Hisui. Though I
have my doubts, the story could well contain a shred of truth.
regigigas.title: Pok√©mon Colosal

cresselia.name: cresselia
cresselia.description:
Cresselia is reminiscent of the crescent moon. It leaves a brilliant
line of light in its wake as it flies across the night sky. I daresay
it resembles the heavenly maiden who created the Milky Way.
cresselia.title: Pok√©mon Lunar

tornadus.name: tornadus
tornadus.description:
This storm-stirring Pok√©mon is said to cause the seasons to
turn by whipping up the air. I suspect its humanlike form to be
a false one.
tornadus.title: Pok√©mon Torbellino

thundurus.name: thundurus
thundurus.description:
They say this wielder of electricity has waged war with its
nemesis, Tornadus, since time immemorial. The lightning bolts
it hurls pierce the very earth and enrich the soil.
thundurus.title: Pok√©mon Centella

landorus.name: landorus
landorus.description:
When the incarnations of wind and of lightning clash, Landorus
arrives to quell the conflict. After the tempests and thunderbolts
abate, the land is sure to be blessed with bountiful harvests.
landorus.title: Pok√©mon Fertilidad

enamorus.name: enamorus
enamorus.description:
When it flies to this land from across the sea, the bitter winter
comes to an end. According to legend, this Pok√©mon's love
gives rise to the budding of fresh life across Hisui.

dialga.name: dialga
dialga.description:
This Pok√©mon is revered as a deity in Hisuian legend. The birth
of Dialga was what caused the vast river of time to begin
flowing in our world.
dialga.title: Pok√©mon Temporal

palkia.name: palkia
palkia.description:
This Pok√©mon is feared as a deity in Hisuian legend. The birth
of Palkia was what caused the walls of our world to disappear,
creating a sky that spans for infinity.
palkia.title: Pok√©mon Espacial

giratina.name: giratina
giratina.description:
There is one Hisuian verse that tells of a powerful light creating
a deep shadow. I imagine that this deep shadow is Giratina.
giratina.title: Pok√©mon Renegado

arceus.name: arceus
arceus.description:
It is the heavenly fount from which pours the light that shines
across Hisui. Its luminance guides and protects all Pok√©mon.
Hisuian mythology states that Arceus is the creator of all things.
arceus.title: Pok√©mon Alfa

phione.name: phione
phione.description:
Can be seen floating offshore during seasons when the seas are
warm. Its azure body blends in with the ocean waters‚Äîlogic
suggests this is a defense mechanism against natural predators.
phione.title: Pok√©mon Marino

manaphy.name: manaphy
manaphy.description:
Rumored to migrate across the oceans and visit Hisui's coastal
waters only rarely. Although Manaphy resembles Phione, it is
also quite different. The relation between the two is unclear.
manaphy.title: Pok√©mon N√°utico

shaymin.name: shaymin
shaymin.description:
When the turning of seasons brings the cruel winter to its end
and the joyous people give thanks to the heavens, Shaymin
appears and covers the withered land with flowers.
shaymin.title: Pok√©mon Gratitud

darkrai.name: darkrai
darkrai.description:
On a moonless night, a strange incident occurred in which every
one of a village's inhabitants suffered nightmares. The villagers
attested that Darkrai appeared before them in these nightmares.
darkrai.title: Pok√©mon Oscuridad
